channel.title: [PI] URGENT When Someone Talks it shows up as "S"
channel.description:
When someone else talks on my server it shows up as "S s s s s s s" heres a pic! PLEASE HELP THIS REALLY NEEDS TO BE FIXED! I have looked and i cant figure out how to fix it and ive also searched.
[img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/9314/27842328.jpg[/img]
EDIT: Fixed, my chat class had the packes in the wrong spot, thanks to ExtremeX-Scape™ for notifying me of that :)
